description.zh-cn: 汉族，竹笛演奏家，中华人民共和国政治人物。曾任中国歌剧舞剧院院长、党委副书记，是中国共产党党员、中国音乐家协会会员，并当选为第十一届全国政协委员。
description.en: A Chinese dizi performer and political figure of Han ethnicity. He served as the President and Deputy Party Secretary of the China National Opera and Dance Drama Theater, is a member of the Communist Party of China and the Chinese Musicians Association, and was elected as a member of the 11th National Committee of the CPPCC.

en: China National Opera and Dance Drama Theater

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家级表演艺术团体。
description.en: A national-level performing arts group in the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第十一届全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十一届全国委员会
en: 11th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的第十一届全国委员会，任期为2008年至2013年。
description.en: The 11th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, with a term from 2008 to 2013.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，通常简称为中国。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由中国各民族音乐家组成的专业性人民团体。
description.en: A professional people's organization composed of musicians of all ethnic groups in China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的音乐高等院校。
description.en: An institution of higher education in music located in Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 林文增担任中国歌剧舞剧院院长、党委副书记。
description.en: Lin Wenzeng served as the President and Deputy Party Secretary of the China National Opera and Dance Drama Theater.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议第十一届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 2008年，林文增当选第十一届全国政协委员，代表文化艺术界，分入第二十七组。
description.en: In 2008, Lin Wenzeng was elected as a member of the 11th National Committee of the CPPCC, representing the Culture and Arts sector in Group 27.

description.zh-cn: 林文增是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Lin Wenzeng is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 林文增是中国音乐家协会会员。
description.en: Lin Wenzeng is a member of the Chinese Musicians Association.

description.zh-cn: 林文增是上海音乐学院的校友。
description.en: Lin Wenzeng is an alumnus of the Shanghai Conservatory of Music.

description.zh-cn: 林文增是中华人民共和国的政治人物。
description.en: Lin Wenzeng is a political figure in the People's Republic of China.
